txt_en: The fruit derived from labor is the sweetest of pleasures.
txt_cn: 劳动所得的果实是最甜美的。
author: Luc de Clapiers

txt_en: In the depth of winter I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.
txt_cn: 在隆冬，我终于知道，在我的身体里面，藏着一个无法战胜的夏天。
author: Albert Camus

txt_en: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don't belong.
txt_cn: 成长很痛苦，改变很痛苦，但是最痛苦的是卡在你本不应该在的地方。
author: Mandy Hale

txt_en: Integrity is the most valuable and respected quality of leadership. Always keep your word.
txt_cn: 诚信是最宝贵和最受尊重的领导品质。永远要信守诺言。
author: Brian Tracy

txt_en: One benefit of Summer was that each day we had more light to read by.
txt_cn: 夏天的好处之一便是我们有更多的阳光来阅读。
author: Jeannette Walls

txt_en: We are no longer happy so soon as we wish to be happier.
txt_cn: 在祈求更快乐的那一刻，我们便不再真正快乐。
author: Walter Savage Landor

txt_en: Never deprive someone of hope; it might be all they have.
txt_cn: 千万不要剥夺别人的希望，那可能是他们所拥有的全部。
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

txt_en: In fair weather prepare for foul.
txt_cn: 宜未雨绸缪。
author: Thomas Fuller

txt_en: There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.
txt_cn: 你所能完成的事情没有限制，除非你限制了自己的想法。
author: Brian Tracy

txt_en: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
txt_cn: 你可能无法控制所有发生在你身上的事，但是你可以决定不被它们所累。
author: Maya Angelou

txt_en: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
txt_cn: 如果你改变看事物的方式，事物也会因此而改变。
author: Wayne Dyer

txt_en: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
txt_cn: 我们往往记住的不是某一天，而是某个时刻。
author: Cesare Pavese

txt_en: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says "I'm possible"!
txt_cn: 没有不可能，连“不可能”这个词自己都说：“不，可能！”
author: Audrey Hepburn

txt_en: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
txt_cn: 快乐的真谛在于对日常生活的点滴都发自内心地感兴趣。
author: William Morris

txt_en: Optimism is the one quality more associated with success and happiness than any other.
txt_cn: 与其他品质相比，乐观更能让你获得成功和幸福。
author: Brian Tracy

txt_en: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
txt_cn: 友善是一种语言，失聪的人和失明的人也能感受。
author: Mark Twain

txt_en: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
txt_cn: 你通过达成目标所得到的并不重要，重要的是你通过达成目标而成为什么样的人。
author: Zig Ziglar

txt_en: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
txt_cn: 生命的意义不在于发现你自己，而在于创造你自己。
author: George Bernard Shaw

txt_en: Never limit yourself because of others’ limited imagination; never limit others because of your own limited imagination.
txt_cn: 不要被他人有限的想象力所限制，也不要用自己有限的想象力限制他人。
author: Mae Jemison

txt_en: Today’s accomplishments were yesterday’s impossibilities.
txt_cn: 今日的成就都是在昨日被认为不可能的事。
author: Robert H. Schuller

txt_en: Speak less than you know; have more than you show.
txt_cn: 怀璧慎显，博识谨言。
author: William Shakespeare

txt_en: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
txt_cn: 当我们对重要的事保持沉默时，我们人生便开始失去价值。
author: Martin Luther King Jr.
